alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 4:40AM EST until January 25 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected this morning with a light coating of snow and sleet, or some light icing from freezing rain. * WHERE...Mainly north of the I-64 corridor. In Virginia, this includes Alleghany, Bath and Rockbridge Counties. In West Virginia, Greenbrier County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to warm above freezing by afternoon. The advisory may be cancelled early.
info.instruction: If you encounter any wintry form of precipitation, please slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
